title: USPS to Release Ansel Adams Stamps
content:
The US Postal Service is set to release a sheet of 16 stamps featuring the legendary photography of Ansel Adams.

Ansel Adams made a career of crafting photographs in exquisitely sharp focus and nearly infinite tonality and detail. His ability to consistently visualize a subject â€” not how it looked in reality but how it felt to him emotionally â€” led to some of the most famous images of Americaâ€™s natural treasures including Half Dome in Californiaâ€™s Yosemite Valley, the Grand Tetons in Wyoming, and Denali in Alaska, the highest peak in the United States.

No pre-order links yet, but the stamps will be available on May 15. (via @anseladams)
